inn1.comm: starts off with a wide, too far outside off
some shape in towards the left-hand batsman, he helps it off his pads for a single
pitched up outside off, Farhat lets it go outside off
flirting with that wide line, called in but only marginally
this one moves away from the left-hander and ends up being a wide
brings this back in, Farhat shoulders arms, brave leave
goes straight with the angle, Farhat shoulders arms again
angled across him, left alone again
on target, just short of driving length, around off, Butt defends it back to the bowler
same channel again, Butt presses forward to pat it back to the bowler
first sign of intent, helped of course by Nehra who bowls a wide half-volley, Butt gets on a knee and caresses it past cover
into the pads, played towards midwicket
first sign of swing for Nehra, starts middle and off, and shapes away, Butt is right behind it
angled into the pads, Butt's bat face closes early, is hit on the thigh
swings away, pitched around off, drawing him into a shot, and then beats the outside edge
closer to the stumps, this time he plays at it, pushing to mid-on
left alone outside off again, a good-old-fashioned start from Farhat
pitches leg and middle, swinging towards off, pushed to mid-off
and left along outside off again
well-directed short ball, and it lobs off the glove towards short fine leg, gets off the mark off the 11th delivery he faces
sharp single to wide of mid-on
swing for Nehra, pitches middle and off, moving away, he defends with an open face, semi-squared up
looks to defend outside off, gets an inside edge onto the pad, the benefit of keeping bat and pad close together
full ball, defended to mid-on
nicely played, full delivery on the pads, and he just presents the full face of the bat, and the ball travels between the umpire and the mid-on
pulls the length back a bit, defended back to him
and beats him outside off again, the inswinger goes away from his bat and he ends up driving inside the line
shorter, pushed to point this time
full, around off, comes to the front foot and plays it back to PK
looks for the dream ball, pitching leg and taking off types, Farhat is squared up as he defends

he is troubling Farhat consistently without any success, this time he gets an edge with the inswinger, but it goes wide of slip and for four - by the way soft hands meant it wouldn't have carried anyway
it's all happening through slips here, this one would have carried too! Shorter ball, Farhat cuts, gets an edge that flies wide of slip
loose shot, looks to cut, no feet, is beaten outside off
angling into the pads, helped away to fine leg for one
back of a length, gets an inside edge towards square leg
length ball, outside off, pushed to mid-off
left alone outside off, nice bounce from back of a length
left alone outside off again
length ball, swinging away, pushed to cover
this one swings in towards him, stays back and plays it back to the bowler
beats him outside off as he goes for the flashy drive
played with an open face to point
flashes outside off, the ball stays low and beats him
maiden over, defends one off the front foot
pinches a single to just wide of mid-off
dug in short, doesn't get high, and even though Butt is on the front foot he dismissively pulls it between mid-on and midwicket
leaves this alone outside off
the sharper bouncer, Butt is in no control of this pull, from throat high, and the top edge lands smack in between Dhoni and Harbhajan at fine leg
punched to extra cover
length ball, played back to the bowler
and he has hit the first ball at him, hard, on the bounce, Rohit doesn't let it through
and again to the same fielder, played with soft hands this time
poor ball, long hop  on the leg side with a tight off-side field, and easily pulled away for four
left alone outside off this time
slower ball, gets an inside edge onto the pad
another slower ball, guided to third man for one
a touch full and Butt leans forward and times the cover drive to perfection, splitting the infield, the fielder chases but it's futile
short of a length and closer to the stumps, Butt stays in his crease and gets an inside edge on to the pad
Zaheer cuts the ball into the left-hander, it hits the top of the front pad outside off and runs past Dhoni's right for four leg byes
defended on the front foot
Butt gets behind the line and defends solidly
short of a length around off stump, Butt stays on the back foot and opens the face to play towards point
Farhat drives off the back foot and gets a thick edge towards third man
short ball and it barely bounces, Farhat pulls and mis-times it too, the ball falls safely in the outfield
another attempted drive off the back foot but the thick edge rolls towards a wide slip
Farhat charges, gets to the pitch of a length delivery, and heaves over mid-on, Pakistan are building momentum now
Farhat moves across his stumps and works the ball off his hips to long leg
length ball on off stump, defended on the front foot on the off side
good length outside off, Farhat shoulders arms
not much room on off stump but Farhat flashes and cuts the ball hard to third man where Praveen fumbles
Farhat works the ball on the leg side with his wrists and calls Butt through
Butt takes half a stride forward and blocks a good length ball towards cover
Butt tries to cut but gets a bottom edge into the ground
length delivery around off stump, Butt waits in his crease and drives in front of point to keep strike
short of a length outside off, cut down to third man for one more
guided off the front foot past point, the batsman hustle the fielder at third man and complete two
worked off the pads behind square for a single
terrific hands from Butt, he waited for a short of a length ball to nearly pass him before dabbing at it and guiding it ever so fine past the keeper
he's slapped that over midwicket, Nehra drops short and on this pitch the ball sits up at 130kmh and asks for punishment
defended on the front foot towards the off side
played firmly but straight to the fielder at cover
cut hard off the back foot but the ball is intercepted by the fielder at point
finally a delivery that causes some trouble, Zaheer sends down a yorker that forces the batsman to dig it out
played to mid-on off the front foot
driven off the back foot to wide mid off
too close to cut and the batsman can't beat the fielder at point
cuts a fullish delivery, straight to point
angling into the pads, worked around the corner for one
stays back and pushes this to mid-off
nicely tossed up outside off, gets the outside half of the bat towards point
arm ball, the toppie, Farhat sitting back, just gets his bat down in time
pushes forward to defend this flighted delivery
nicely tossed, played with an open face towards deep point
looks to cut a fullish delivery, finds point
Kohli makes a diving save to his left, at cover
gently worked around the corner towards short fine
presses forward and defends
comes forward and pushes it down to long-on
drift in towards the leftie, defended to the bowler
comes down the track, looks to work it long-on, gets a leading edge towards long-off
lovely catch, lovely bowling, just 80ks, gets grip from the surface after pitching just outside off, Farhat jabs at it, gets an edge, and Sehwag takes a lovely one-handed catch to his right at slip
turning in to him, defended towards midwicket
stretches all the way forward and outside off and defends
stays back and pushes a shortish ball towards mid-on
flighted delivery, defended towards cover
his typical wristy push through the covers, gets a single
hint of drift away, Malik covers it and defends
gets off the mark with a single pushed down to long-on
looks to play long-off, gets the inside half towards long-on
Malik hits his stride, lovely late-cut, from inside Dhoni's gloves, gets four for it
dances down the track, pushes this to long-off for one
too full, easy single to long-on
easy single to long-on
some dip there, Malik has to really stretch to get close to it, but does well and plays it back to Bhaj
shorter, stays back and easily pushes it down to long-on
looks to force it through the off side, the ball doesn't turn, gets an inside edge back towards the bowler
pushes down to long-on for one
drifting into the pads, flicked away to fine leg
short, turning in, easy single taken to long-on
pushed to sweeper-cover for one
too full, Malik plays it down the ground for one
invitingly tossed up outside off, Butt falls for it, throws his bat at it, gets a thick edge that flies square of point for four. Fifty for Butt, yet another against India
full, down the leg side, sweeps it fine, fine of fine leg, gets two
flatter delivery, into the pads, nicely placed to the other side of fine leg, takes another two
poor ball, short and wide, and Malik cuts it mercilessly, easy four runs
tossed up this time, into the pads, defended towards square leg
shorter, and pushed down to long-on for one
nicely played, it is a flighted delivery, he waits for it to turn and then guides it past the slip, pretty deliberate and delicate
and invited with a sweep first up, gets a single
full, into the pads, played to midwicket
slower, higher, on off, pushed to cover
cut away from in front of off, gets a single
beats him on the cut shot, stays low a touch
connects well with the cut shot this time, to the right of sweeper-cover, gets two
shortish delivery, pushed to midwicket
walks into it and gets a single to long-on
flighted delivery, too full, pushed to long-off for one
pushed through, into the pads, and played between fine leg and deep square, easy two
oof, lovely shot, Malik is delicately taking India apart here. Not too short, but waits for it to turn, and just guides it very late past Dhoni. Sooper shot
stretches forward to defend
flat, around off, played back to the batsman
comes down the track, drives it towards long -off for one
short and wide, cut away, square of sweper-cover, PK dives, keeps it inside, falls over the rope, then cautiously comes back in, and during that time they take an extra run
another single pushed down the ground
pats this delivery back to the bowler
flat outside off, pushed down to long-off for one
flighted around leg stump, played back to the bowler
flat on off, pushed back to him
and he still manages to cut it! Fullish delivery and he makes room, and also places it wide of sweeper-cover
single to long-on
defended towards cover
flat delivery, gets on the front foot and gets a single
flat outside off, gets a single to sweeper-cover
pushed to midwicket, straightish it is
fuller, and gets an easy single to long-on
flat and fast, stays back and pushes it to long-on
flighted around off, defended to the bowled
pushed through this time, cramping him for room, gets another dit ball
lazy shot outside off, just opens the face to a length ball, beaten
charges at him, making room too, manages a weak hit to mid-on
poor short ball, not much effort behind it, pitched half way and rises only hip high, and pulled between mid-on and midwicket
fuller, and punched away wide of sweeper-cover for two
short outside off, runs it down to third man
short, into the ribs, fended away to fine leg for one
looks to push it down to long-on, ends up hitting to extra cover
swept away to fine leg
flat outside off, and again placed wide of that sweeper-cover for two
full, and now he takes that single to long-on
on target, neither too full nor too short, patted back to the bowler
fired down the leg side
pushed back at him, Jadeja dives to his left but lets it through him for a single
length ball, on the pads, late in turning his wrists, hit high on the pad
and Malik plays his first loose shot of the day, no feet and looking to go over mid-off, is beaten
makes a good comeback, drops it at his feet and takes a single
runs this down to third man for one
length ball, around off, no room, defended to cover

Zaheer gets the breakthrough! Superb length, can't drive, can't pull, Malik is stuck on the crease, and ends up defending outside the line of the ball and is bowled. Get a feeling that the ball didn't go with the angle as Malik expected it to
pushed down to long-on for one
defends the first ball he faces
pushes the next one down to long-on for one
premeditated sweep, and connects thin air
superb work by Jadeja off his own bowling, Butt charges at him, trying to push it to long-off, Jadeja dives to his right, fields it cleanly, and throws to Dhoni, to find Butt out of the crease
shortish ball, punched to extra cover
worked off his hip

nearly another run-out! Gets a leading edge towards mid-off, wants a single, Amin sends him back, Saurabh Tiwary's throw hits Akmal in the back of his leg. Both of them played each other at U-19, did Tiwary and Akmal
gets a single to point
length ball outside off, defended
fuller, into the pads, pushed down to long-on for one
goes round the wicket, and Akmal shuffles inside the line and whips it off his hips, between fine leg and deep square
comes down the track, pushes it to long-off
drops this wide of cover for one
flat and fast, easy single to long-on
beaten on the reverse-sweep, hits Dhoni's leg and ricochets to short fine
Akmal cuts from in front of the stumps, gets a single
worked away off the pads, looks for two but Bhajji is quick running in from fine leg
flighted delivery, easily pushed down to long-off
doosra, plays it late, and opens the face on it to take a single
draws him out of the crease, hit uppishly towards extra cover, but bounces in front of him

Kohli has plucked a beauty! Well bowled again, slower through the air, 81.7ks, extra bounce there as Amin cuts, and it is travelling to the left of Kolhi who dives and comes up with a one-handed catch. Top work Kohli
dangerous sweep, premeditated, and a full delivery too, gets his bat down in time
flighted delivery, and Umar defends off the front foot
full outside off, driven wide of long-off for two
slower through the air, gently played wide of point for one
into the pads, and worked away for an easy single
swept away, premeditated again, gets a single to fine leg
punched off the back foot to cover
poor work by Dhoni, actually no work from Dhoni! Edged by Afridi, dropped, and then he is not even looking as they steal a single while the ball has not even gone five feet
lovely batting, comes down the track and drills him down the ground, and long-on has no chance - and this has come all along the ground mind you
whoa! goes in the air, and hits the sight screen. Lovely batting, after dimantling Murali he is going after Bhaj now, neat straight hit
round the wicket, full outside off, hit to sweeper-cover for one
drops it to cover to hand over the strike
slower through the air, Afridi aborts the big shot and works it around the corner
single pushed down to long-on
big slow-sweep, doesn't get much bat on it but gets a single
reverse-sweeps, gets a single to short third man
full ball, hit down to long-on for one
wide down the leg side
defended back to the bowler
short and wide, and cut away for one
and starts off with a poor delivery, long hop outside leg, no effort behind it, and Umar pulls it for four, fine of fine leg
takes a step down, and pushes this shortish delivery to point
looking to give him the charge, Nehra bowls the slower one, making him play a defensive stroke
runs this down to third man for one
lovely late-cut, leans back to manufacture room, and guides it past Dhoni and fine of third man
looks to drop and run, but has left it too close to Nehra and is hence sent back
looks to play into the off side, no room, hit back to the bowler
punched away, can't beat the straightish extra cover

Umar Akmal gone! One cute shot too many, premeditates the paddle sweep, is not to the pitch of it, the bounce takes the edge, into the helmet grille, and then lobs to Dhoni who rolls over to complete the catch
gets off the mark with a single to long-off, it has been available all afternoon
almost played on, no turn there, but the ball bounces over the stumps and over Dhoni and they take one
defended off the back foot, was just short of a length
guided to third man for one
looks for that one to third man, but too full it is, and he ends up hitting it to point
worked off the hips for a single to fine leg
on the pads, worked between fine leg and deep square
back of a length, tucking him up, pushed to point
flat, on the stumps, defended
length ball, finds straightish extra cover
gets this one down to long-off
full, nearly a yorker, played to extra cover
into the pads, watchfully played back to the bowler
off the back foot, he pushes it down to long-on
slower ball, his attempted shot to third man goes to point
length ball, around middle and off, pushed to mid-off
worked off the pad for one
nicely guided with an open face, wide of third man, comes back for two
whipped away towards long-on for one
pushed through the covers for one
starts off with a short-and-wide loosener, and cut away, but Bhaj does well from third man to keep them down to one
good legcutter, beats Afridi as he looks to run it down
moves across the line to play the pick-up shot towards deep midwicket, Gambhir covers a lot of ground but can't get to it, makes sure his body is behind it as it bounces in front of him
and another one doesn't carry to deep midwicket, Kumar bowls shot, gets a top edge from the Akmal pull, and it bounces in between square leg and deep midwicket
slower ball, waits for it, pushes it down to long-on for one
length ball around off, defended
fuller, played to midwicket
another dot ball, hit to extra cover
good sharp bouncer, shin high, Akmal is beaten on the pull
punched on the up, gets a single to sweeper-cover
dropped in the follow through, goes for the yorker outside leg as he backs away, ends up bowling a half volley, Afridi drills it back at him, he gets both hands to it, but it pops out
firm shot, but Raina makes a good stop at extra cover
slower legcutter, beats him outside off, bounces in front of Dhoni
short ball, pulled away to deep square
plumb lbw, India have hung in superbly here! A frustrated Afrdi walks right across the stumps, and is beaten by the slower one, hit dead in front
cuts in front of square, can't beat extra cover
this time cuts it to sweeper-cover for one
gets an inside edge as he looks to turn this to leg
heavy ball, surprises Akmal with the quickness. He is late into it as he looks to work it to leg
pinches a single to extra cover
Pakistan finally get something, too short, not much effort, thigh high, and pulled over midwicket - first boundary in 8 overs
another pull but this is too full, hits this to mid-on
backs away and heaves, hits one bounce to midwicket

and he gets a wicket first ball! Razzaq looks for trademark clear-the-front-leg-and-hit-straight shot, PK bowls full, gets  a slight shape away, and hence a thick edge through to Dhoni. PK has not smiled that much in a long time
length ball, middle and leg, shaping away, defended
drops and runs to mid-off
that's a poor delivery, goes for a yorker, bowls a juicy full toss down the leg side and Akmal deposits it over square leg
full and straight, gets a single to long-on
bouncer, Aamer lets it go
starts off with a length ball, and works fine for Akmal, who backs away and lofts him straight over his head. Loosener there, and Akmal gets stuck into it
yorker this time, and squeezed past extra cover
short outside off, gets a toe end towards third man
oh Zaheer fielding like Nehra here. Nehra gets a top edge from Akmal, towards fine leg, but Zaheer never got under it. There was a lot of time to get under it, but he didn't pick it
yorker here, concedes a single
tailing in towards the stumps, gets a single to mid-off
backs away, Zak follows him with a short ball, gets a dot ball
sacrifices his wicket to get Akmal on strike. Cramps him up again, he drops it straight to short midwicket and runs, and Rohit gets him with a simple, unhurried, underarm flick
yorker, digs it out, gets it straight down the ground, enough time to get two
nice shot, misses the yorker by a foot, and he squeezes it between mid-off and extra cover
short, into the ribs, fends it towards fine leg
full and straight, played back to the bowler
runs it down to point for one
high full toss, and Akmal backs away and cashes in, huge six over midwicket, and it is also a no-ball for height
superb shot from Akmal, PK bowls length, he backs away and heaves it over the on side, just a couple of feet inside the boundary
low full toss this time, Akmal is looking midwicket again, but ends up slicing it towards mid-on, and Raina runs from straightish extra cover to claim it
gives Shoaib the bouncer. Now just hope young man that you don't need to bat. Fast bowlers never forget bouncers bowled at them
slower ball, into the pads, concedes a leg-bye
short outside off, Ajmal premeditates to play it to on, is beaten
yorker, they try a single to Dhoni, sent back, Dhoni hits the stumps, and they steal an overthrow
angled across him, beats him outside off
Pakistan are bowled out! Hit straight down mid-off's throat

inn2.comm: gets off the mark with a single to third man
sharp movement in, and a sharp leg-bye stolen, to midwicket - a direct hit would have got Sehwag
fuller, outside off, left alone
back of a length, little Gambhir on his toes to defend it
thick edge as the bat face closes, wide of second slip, and the slips are really deep
again back of a length, Viru stays back, on his toes, punches it into the off side
short and wide, and steered away for one
nice bumper, Sehwag sways out of the line and drops his wrists
punched to mid-off, watchful start so far from Sehwag
well bowled, short, but no room, in fact it chases him as he backs away to cut, in the end just about beats the edge
on the back foot again, pushed to cover
and beaten on the cut again, sharp pace
played with an open face towards point
length ball, outside off, pushed to cover
good bouncer, Gambhir shapes to pull but sees it is too high, and sways out of the line
back of a length, pushing him back, tucking him up, defended back to the bowler. Nice rhythm for Shoaib today
underside edge for four! Looking to make room here, but it cramps him up, and the edge misses both the stumps and the keeper
slower ball, big change-up, 123ks, nearly a yorker, Gambhir digs it out
Aamer bowling a good channel, back of a length, just outside off, Sehwag hangs his bat out there and is beaten by the angle
similar delivery but this time he gets behind it and punches it to cover, more like the Sehwag we know. He seems to have been consciously cautious
extra bounce here, and Sehwag is beaten outside off again, all three balls same area, but this one doing something off the seam
bouncer, ducks under it - 11 balls, no run for Viru - he doesn't do that in Tests even
gets off the mark here, punched away towards third man
beaten on the cut, but it is not short enough for that shot
stays back to a full delivery, they have really pushed him back here, and the inside edge saves him, otherwise he was dead here
goes back to short of a length, defended back to Shoaib
stays back and whips it past mid-on where Razzaq fumbles to allow them the second. Afridi is furious
first bad ball, short and wide, and cut away, but doesn't time it too well, and finds point
wide down the leg side
nice shot, leaning into the line, punching it towards cover
short, into the ribs, Sehwag on his toes, hit on the thigh, and Akmal lets it through his legs, allowing them take an extra run. Sehwag very urgent there
first really confident shot from GG, short and wide, and deliberately gets under it, cutting it over point
slightly fuller, looks to drop and run, but decides against it

short and wide again, this time cuts it softly, between point and cover-point, and Malik gives in a superb chase, and back-flicks it to Amin who is following him and that keeps the batsmen down to two
back of a length, defended by Gambhir
nicely played, it's outside off, not too short, he waits for it, and opens the face to guide it past the lone slip
short, into the body, he rides the bounce, keeps it down, steals a single
length ball, weakly hit towards extra cover, and they pinch a single
pushes at it away from his body, gets an edge, wide and short of second slip. Perhaps the second slip needs to come in a bit
that's nasty, bouncer, Gambhir looks to sway out of the way but it doesn't rise high enough, and it follows him and hits him on the glove. Luckily for the batsman, it doesn't carry to the keeper
fuller, outside off, defended towards point

looks for a sharp single, wide of square leg, Gambhir wants one, Raina doesn't. Gambhir is not happy, but you can see where Raina is coming for. He is running for Sehwag, wants to be cuatious, also there was a fielder, a square leg umpire and Sehwag all in same area
worked off the hips, gets a single to fine leg
walks down the pitch, and pulls, not very convincing but past midwicket and they get three for it
nicely defended towards mid-off
short ball, sways out of its line, drops his wrists
sharper bouncer this time, Sehwag pulls pout of the shot at the last moment. Akmal makes a one-handed overhead take. Called wide
fuller, testing his feet, Sehwag doesn't need them! Lofts it over cover, his first boundary! It's taken some time. And discomfort in that hip right away
slower ball outside off, and that beats him
full toss, played wristily, back to the bowler
lovely shot, charges at him, Razzaq is almost like a spinner after Shoaib, and then drives it through cover
into the pads, pushed to midwicket
back of a length, off-stump line, pushed back to the bowler
length ball on the pads, but they have protection in the deep on the on side
short, angling away, steered to third man
whipped away off the hips, gets a single to deep square leg
back of a length again, no room, gets an inside edge onto the pad, still in pain, is Viru
short, no room, looks to cut, is beaten around off, at least fourth of fifth time that Aamer has beaten Sehwag there
misses on the flick, but they steal a leg-bye. The ball didn't go too far. Was raina backing up far? These runs are difficult to take if you have played the ball too
lovely slower ball, not a big change-up, very subtle, big shout for lbw, but the angle and perhaps the height save him. But a mighty close lbw shout
worked off the pads this time, wide of deep square, gets two
walks down the track this time, and flicks it from in front of the stumps
runs this down to third man for one
Sehwag is gone! And Razzaq, not for the first time, provides the breakthrough. Good delivery too, just back of a length, just outside off, holding its line ever so slightly, and taking his edge
defended into the off side
length ball, around off, defended back to the bowler
presses forward to defend with an open face
pushed wide of mid-off to get off the mark
back of a length, coming in a bit, patted back to the bowler
nice nice shot, leaning into the drive, meeting on the up, just wide of Afridi at mid-off, and it flies across the outfield
lovely delivery, rolls his fingers on it, and hence he gets it to move away after pitching. Reminiscent of Waz
fuller, presses forward to defend
another defensive shot, back to the bowler, tight line from round the stumps
gets inside the line this time and works it square of fine leg and comes back for two
walks down the pitch, gets across the line of off stump, that saves him from the lbw, what's more they run through too. Anyway there was an inside edge
slight movement in towards him, pushed wide of mid-on for one
comes down the track, Razzaq keeps it short, he plays it back to the bowler
looks to run it down to third man, finds gully. They are denying him that single
length ball, gets inside the line, gets a single to wide of mid-on
length ball, slight straightening of the line, Kohli right on top of it
gets a single to short fine leg, worked off the pads
spins into the pads, hits him on the pad and rolls off
short, turning in sharply, pulled away wide of deep square
flat again, and he gets a single wide of mid-on
offbreak, no room, played to point
beauty! Sharp offbreak at 96.5ks, beats him, pitches leg and middle and beats him outside off
into the ribs, gets inside the line, to try and play it fine, comes off the thigh and they get just two leg-byes
outside off, punched back to the bowler
length ball, plays across the line, and gets a single to deep square
looks to drop and run, but has hit too hard towards point
looks to pull, and perhaps it doesn't rise high enough and hence he plays over it
worked off the hips for one
shortish, pulled down to long-on for one
worked with the spin, wide of mid-on

worked off the pads, they steal two between deep square and fine leg. No communication there between the two Shoaibs. Malik is charging, he misses, and Akmal says, "Well done Malik". Some banter there
a single wide of mid-on
flighted around off, played towards point
length ball outside off, pushed to mid-off
slightly slower, worked wide of mid-on for one
looks to steer this to third man, gets an underside edge, it misses the off stump
short, slow, and Gambhir rocks back and pulls it over midwicket. Adjusting to the low bounce for Razzaq
walks across the line, drops it on the square and takes a single
misses out, length ball on the pads, gets just a leg-bye
flighted delivery, pushed to long-on for one
opens the face on it, steals a single to backward point
punched away off the back foot, wide of sweeper-cover. Doosra it was, well read

played on! Kohli looks to cut, but it is too full, and he duly gets a bottom edge. Looks at the pitch , suggesting perhaps that it stayed low, but it wasn't the correct shot. He misread the length and paid the price
Dhoni's hockey-stick shot there, low grip, stretches to the pitch of it, and then guides it almost with its wrists, wide of point, and runs hard for two
doesn't see the doosra here, but manages to get it wide of third man, and comes back for two
leading edge straight away as he turns his wrists too early, and it bounces in front of straightish extra cover
on the pads, clipped away nicely, uses all Shoaib's pace for four to square leg. Well played
again clipped away off the pads, but towards fine leg this time
nice short one, tucks him up, Dhoni in the air to fend at it, gets the bottom hand off, keeps it down
punched away from outside off, gets a single to deep point
short outside off, getting big, he manges to keep it down as he steers it to third man, and he gets to a fifty. Nice, calculated effort
loose shot, no slip! Drags him forward, not quite to the pitch of it, and the offbreak gets the edge, wide of keeper
fuller, this time he is close to it, plays it to extra cover
doosra this time, too close to him as he looks to cut
makes a mock forward movement, Ajmal keeps it full, he stays back and plays towards point
flatter this time, cut away for one
gets forward, works it with the spin for a single to fine leg
short loosener, cut in front of square for one
opens the face on it, but the short third man is fine
looks to work a shortish ball into the on side, but straight to midwicket
offbreak, played towards short third again
looks to run nit down again, extra bounce beats him, Akmal thinks it is a catch. Probably excited at the rare clean take
short and wide this time, but it hits the toe end, GG not happy with it, and rightly so
beauty, flight, dip, sharp offbreak, hit outside the line, that's what saves him
ha ha ha ha, GG premeditates a paddle sweep, the slip is alert runs towards the leg side, and then he plays the reverse paddle. Chuckles all around
doosra, beats him, and Akmal goes up again. Again it turns out to be just the excitement at having collected it cleanly
offbreak, defended towards square leg
similar delivery, similar shot, similar result
nicely tossed up, and a leading edge goes towards extra cover, along the ground. Superb bowling
helped away to short fine leg for one
played wide of extra, Umar lets them get through for two. Afridi: "Umar kaunsi fielding hai yeh?" [What kind of fielding is this?]
full and fast, defended
gets a single to long-off
comes down the track, the bowler slows it down, beating him in the flight, he kicks it away
gets a single to sweeper-cover
punched away to sweeper-cover
lapped away fine for one
looks for the paddle, gets an edge onto the pad for one
topspinner, punched away for one
driven towards sweeper-cover for one
doosra, lovely bowling, Dhoni is not picking them, pitches leg, takes the leading edge, and wide of slip
hit straight to midwicket
short, cut away to deep point for one
full ball, driven to long-off for one
presses forward, sees a shortish ball, goes back, and then takes a single to short fine
tossed up, nearly yorks him
driven down to long-off for one
short, hit straight towards extra cover
short and wide again, and again he finds extra cover
flighted this time, hit on the pad outside off
gets a single to long-on for one
oh too close to be trying that late cut, and anyway short third man is too fine as he finds out
angled into the pads, worked away to fine leg for one
wide down the leg side
the late cut again, but straight to short third man
loose full toss, and he has wristed down it down the ground for four, between the bowler and long-on, first boundary for 43 deliveries
beaten on the cut
driven to sweeper-cover for one
leading edge, but it falls short of midwicket
that back-cut again, can't find the gap on it
flat down the leg side, could have let it be a wide, tries the vertical sweep, hits straight to short fine, and Gambhir has to dive full length to get in
cut away for one
nurdled off the pad for one
doosra, beats him on the cut
cut away in front of square, takes a single again
watchfully played back to the bowler
flat delivery, hit back to the bowler
flighted, pushed down to long-on for one
short, can't get it off the square
flighted here, and pushed to long-on for one
cut to extra cover, Butt's fumble allows them one
flighted delivery, drilled back, ricochets off Afridi's foot for one

top shot, dances down the track, right to the pitch of the ball, and smashes it along the ground to the long-on boundary. There wasn't much distance for the long-on fielder to cover, but he couldn't make it
worked into the on side, soft hands, they steal two. Some Umar gets an earful. Not sure if Amin or AKmal
short, cut away straight to extra cover
worked away for a single

dropped at wide long-off by Aamer! Is it the match? Is it the poor lights? At any rate, to recount the events, Gambhir looks to go over extra cover, ends up hitting much straighter, Aamer gets under a dolly, and this is at least the third dolly dropped under lights in this tournament
flighted outside off, pushed back to the bowler
goes deep into the crease to help it around the corner for one
short, cut away for one
offbreak, front of the hand, pushed down to long-off for one
comes down the track, but finds extra cover with his hit
short, cut straight to pint, and GG steals a single
opens the face in front of the leg stump for a single
cut away, and he finds point again - he has been finding either point or short third man all night
but they can't put a fielder where he just hit! Charging down the ground, going ramrod straight, high elbow and all, straight six, one bounce into the sight screen
worked off the pads here for a single
comes down the track and pushes it down the ground
wide down the leg side
easy single to long-off
turning into the pads, worked away easily
looks to work it square, finds point
comes down the track, hits wide of long-on, and Akhtar starts late, complains he couldn't sight it. They take two
blocked towards cover
short, worked away past short fine leg
offbreak, pitched outside leg, helped away for one
googly, forced into the off side for one
worked with the turn, into the on side for one
cut away, but finds point again
looks to open his face on this, but it is the doosra that chases him and hits him in the arm
steals a single on the adjacent wicket, Ajmal fields, throws, hits Gambhir, and they refuse the overthrow off the body. Nice spirit
pushed into the off side for one
topspinner, big shout for caught behind from Akmal as he takes it on the second attempt, but again there is no bat
length ball, driven straight to mid-off
no-ball! big one too! Dhoni beaten on the cut, but free hit coming up
it's a low reversing full toss, and he heaves it over midwicket for six. From first gear to fifth. Fifty up too
good comeback, back of a length, holding its line outside off, beating him
short outside off, stays back and pushes it to cover
short, sharp, pulled away, along the ground for one
very nicely played, ever so straight, and he gets inside its line and clips it very fine for four. It's given leg-byes, though
tossed up outside off, presses forward to defend
short ball, pushed back to the bowler
doosra, stays back and turns it around the corner for one

bowled him! Very timely wicket! And the only man who looked capable of doing that gets him. Ajmal. Again he looks for that back-cut, slightly too full for it, and it is an offbreak at 95ks, the middle stump is gone
defends the first ball he faces
takes a single, just wide of point
quick, around off, defended
stays back, plays towards point, not much room
Shoaib is unlucky here! Short, fast, and Rohit is some five seconds late in pulling, the underside edge goes for four to fine leg. Could easily have been bowled
good running from Dhoni, initiates that second, played just wide of deep square, and Dhoni urges his partner, "bhaag bhaag 2" [run, run for the second]
top shot, wide and just back of a length, he scorches it with an open face, using the bowler's pace, past point

all night Akmal has been appealing without any edges, now he gets a regulation edge and he drops it! Poor keeping really! Beats me how this man is keeping in international cricket! Sharma goes chasing, edged away slightly wide of him, he sticks out one firm hand and it bounces off it. Really didn't have to go too far
worked into the on side for one
presses forward, defends
flat, around off, played back to him
into the pads, worked away, but straight to short fine
shorter, flatter, pushed down to long-on for one
pushed to wide long-on for one
starts off with a length ball, defended to cover
full on the pads, played watchfully
very much on target, pitching middle, angling towards off, defended to cover
pulled from outside off, unconvincingly, just wide of midwicket. Aamer has persisted all night without results
slower ball, turned away to midwicket
this time controls the pull better, gets a single to fine leg
flighted delivery, pushed to long-off
easy single into the on side
jumps out of the crease, pushes it down the ground for one
slower ball, leading edge as Sharma looks to play on on, bounces in front of Afridi
pushed down to long-on for one
nice swinging yorker, but they steal single to cover
stands in front of his stumps, hit right in front of stumps, but pitched outside leg. Typical Asoka de Silva dismissal I say
defended to on side
punched to cover, another dot ball
back of a length, tucking him up, pushed to midwicket
yorker, digs it out for one. Another good over from Aamer
short ball, hits him in the pad, goes nowhere, Dhoni is late to start the single, but superbly he comes between the fielder and the stumps

Sharma goes! Plays for the legspinner, pressing forward to defend, and this one goes straight through and hits him in front of off and middle. So plumb that even Billy Bowden (usually a not-outer) immediately raised the finger! Afridi gets into his Becker-like celebration
googly, beats him outside off, almost overbalances and gets stumped
full, slow, played down the ground, Afridi dives to his left to field
played with an open face for a single
short, cut away, but straight to point, suddenly we have game on
gets a single to short fine, was angling in

would you believe it? what a move to bring Malik on. Full toss down the leg side, going for a wide, Dhoni tries the fine sweep, it hits the angular part of the back of the bat, and goes onto the stumps. Oh what intuition, what dismissal, Dhoni can't believe it. Game. Is. On
left alone outside off
worked into the off side for one
flat delivery, defended back to the bowler
helped away to short fine for one. What a game-turning over
topspinner, gets a faint inside edge that stifles the appeal
stretches out, forces it into the off side for one
Jadeja plays it back wristily, Ajmal dives to his left, can't prevent the single
defended to point, not much room
fired into the pads, gets a leg-bye to short fine where Shoaib sticks his foot out to prevent
Afridi is not happy, guided towards point where Umar Akmal gets a bad bounce, and it goes for three runs. The one is saved by a spirited chase and dive from Butt
starts off with a beauty, seams away after pitching middle and off. Jadeja had no idea about this ball, and also seemed to be backing away

run-out missed! One of the easier ones I tell you, and Malik misses the direct hit! Defended to wards midwicket, Raina is desperate for the strike, Jadeja sends him back, Raina is half way down the pitch, Malik has an age to aim at all three stumps, but misses. All happening. Pressure writ large on Indian faces
charges at Shaoib who bowls short, can't do much with it there
finally gets off strike, gets a single to wide of mid-off
bouncer to Raina! Crowd comes alive. He ducks under it. Sharp bouncer too. Buzz around the ground here
backs away to the leg side, looks to late-cut this one, beaten, what an over, just the one

bowled him! Jadeja gone! topspinner from round the stumps! Jadeja has no clue about this innings. That's what India-Pakistan does to you. Chips down the track and is comprehensively beaten by this delivery that follows him and hits the top of middle
looks for the sweep, gets a legbye
shot Raina, makes room, gets a flat delivery, uses his pace and places it perfectly between point and short third. Cut from in front of leg! First boundary in nine overs
quicker delivery, worked away square of fine leg, they steal the second. Kamran Akmal to Umar Amin: "Jaldi release karo" [Release fast]
lbw shout, flat toppie, but going down the leg side
slog sweep! slog sweep! Raina plays that shot really well, he holds the key here. What a shot, what a time to play it
lovely timing, pulled away, but one bounce to midwicket
Bhajjiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii. What a shot! India turning it around here. Length ball here, Bhajji was ready for it, and he lofts it over wide long-on. What sweet timing, delicious finish here
looks to run this past short third, finds backward point, Umar Akmal belts a throw, almost conceding an overthrow
slower ball goes horribly wrong, down the leg side, and they steal a bye too. Good thinking Raina
bouncer, into the ribs, played to short fine. Not high enough to be called one for the over
short again, into the ribs, backs away, and manages a single to point
lovely slower ball, Bhaj has backed away and is beaten outside off. They don't try the bye
short-arm slog to wide of long-on, Farhat does really well with a perfect throw to keep them down to one
looks for the hoick across the line, gets an edge onto his toe, and they steal a single
yorker, squeezes it out to point for one
looks for a wide yorker, but bowls it too wide
hit powerfully down to long-on, he wants two but is rightly sent back
tries the bouncer, goes down the leg side, slightly misdirected
lovely shot Raina, misses the yorker by a foot, and he has precisely placed it between long-on and deep midwicket. Goes deep into the crease to turn the yorker into a half-volley
lovely bowling, yorker tailing in as he backs away, stumps are all exposed, but he gets his bat down in time, gets a single to point
Raina has hit a six! Short ball, but not much behind it, doesn't get too high, hip high and he makes room and pulls it over square leg. Lovely shot, puts India ahead
follows that up with a couple, just wide of fine leg, Raina forces him to take the second
finally bowls the yorker, finally gets the dot ball
lovely yorker, but Raina exposes his fitness. He has left the ball on the pitch and stolen a single, and Shoaib doesn't even go for it. He is drained
short ball, Bhajji backs away, looks to upper-cut, misses, back to run a ball

lovely bouncer, he keeps the game alive, Bhaj goes for the big pull and doesn't connect. Shoaib has come back well, and gives Bhaj an earful. Doctrove intervenes, but they have shared some pleasantries already
bouncer into the body, misses, gets an inside edge onto the body, takes a single

desperation! desperation! Short ball, beats Harbhajan's swing, Raina wants a desperate bye, Akmal with the underarm throw gets him! Under pressure, Akmal has redeemed himself. Raina gave it his all, diving, nay flying full length, but was caught short by a frame
Shaoib, what have you done? Is slow to come around from third man, fumbles also, gives them two when all they should have got is one
short ball, PK makes room, cuts in front of point, takes a single

Bhajjiiiiiiiii! He has absolutely smoked this one. Gets a length he can get under, and hits it with the sweetest part of the bat, over  midwicket. HUGE. And he roars, removes the helmet and roars. As soon as he sees he has hit it clean, he looks towards third man, where Shoaib is, and roars. It is a primal roar, what a blinder from Bhajji, Akhtar makes a V sign, and looks away. The whole team runs out to congratulate Bhaj, Raina is the first to hug him. Spare a thought for Aamer, he bowled really well until now
